result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:16 PM Defendant Kyle Joseph Lamb appeared by video.  Attorney David Allan Nelson appeared by video for Kyle Joseph Lamb.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin.

Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:05 PM Prosecuting attorney Rebecca Meyer in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kyle Joseph Lamb appeared by video.  Attorney David Allan Nelson appeared by video for Kyle Joseph Lamb. Defense anticipates a waiver of prelim. Wants discovery prior to preliminary hearing. State sent discovery out on 6/3/22, defense has not received. Defendant continues to waive time limits for preliminary hearing. Court addresses bond-defendant has not elected a counselor or started counseling at this time.  Defense is requesting contact w/children. Court does amend the contact provision w/JKL only. Father's parents to be 3rd party contact and supervision w/reasonable time/notice to the mother. No contact until amended bond is signed and filed.
Preliminary hearing on June 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

UNSIGNED
Standard Conditions
Additional Conditions: 
No contact directly or indirectly with the party/parties named in the bail bond, no contact at their residence/property. 
No violent or abusive contact with the party/parties named in the bail bond. 
Not to consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs or possess drug paraphernalia. 
Not to be on the premises of any tavern or business whose sole purpose is the sale of alcoholic beverages. 
Comply with day reporting requirements alcohol monitoring
Supervised visits w/JKL set up through a 3rd party at reasonable times upon reasonable notice, approved 3rd party is deft's parents.
Day Report Dated: 06/10/22
